name: Safe?
description:
This game was created by Sarah Oshin, it is based off trust, morals and self-discovery. Here you play as the character of Regina and make different decisions that effect the story in different ways. 

Not every path is the right path but that is up to you to choose. How you react under pressure will effect your ending. 

You will meet many people on your journey, friend or foe. However there's only one question nobody can answer but yourself...Are you Safe?

Choose your answers wisely.
